body_html:
Everything compiles successfully! (Tests still fail though, but that is not what this PR is for).

I envy the build speed of the CI server 😆 . A change in tensorflow/core header file normally will trigger a complete re-build and yet the CI job managed to finish < 30 minutes.

I envy the build speed of the CI server 😆 . A change in tensorflow/core header file normally will trigger a complete re-build and yet the CI job managed to finish < 30 minutes.
body:
Everything compiles successfully! (Tests still fail though, but that is not what this PR is for).

I envy the build speed of the CI server 😆 . A change in `tensorflow/core` header file normally will trigger a complete re-build and yet the CI job managed to finish < 30 minutes.
